BAD_URL_MSG: Please enter a valid URL. For example, 'https://example.com/videos'.
BAD_SHORTID_MSG: The shortID cannot be blank, and must only include letters, numbers, underscores, and dashes.
SHORTID_CHANGE_WARNING: Please be aware that changing the shortID will cause the old short link and QRCode to stop working.

UNAVALIABLE_RESPONSE.description: Something went wrong, please try again later.
